comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Wright Model R 1910 also called "Roadster" "Baby Wright" "Racer" Span 26 feet 6 inches Chord 3 feet 6 inches Gap 3 feet 6 inches Approximate Wing Area 180 square feet Approximate gross weight 750 pounds
Was a one -place racer designed for speed and altitude competitions ( The Papers of Wilbur & Orville Wright Volume Two 1906-1948)
